titleStmt.title: The seed of Israels redemption, fully prophesied of, (and the scriptures opened,) which now is about to be fulfilled by its saviour and redeemer, whom God hath now raised up for an ensigne to the nations ... / From a witnesse of Gods salvation ... George Whitehead.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
